scripts.build:proto: mkdir -p src/generated && npx pbjs -t static-module -w es6 --es6 -o src/generated/messages.js src/messages.proto && node -e 'const fs=require("fs");const p="src/generated/messages.js";let c=fs.readFileSync(p,"utf8");c=c.replace("protobufjs/minimal","protobufjs/minimal.js");c=c.replace("import * as $protobuf from \"protobufjs/minimal.js\";","import $protobuf from \"protobufjs/minimal.js\";");fs.writeFileSync(p,c);' && npx pbts -o src/generated/messages.d.ts src/generated/messages.js
